item.title: Multiple methods of greeting
item.description: Hello World in Python linkPrint the expression “Hello world” by various methods. Method 1 link print("Hello world") Method 2 link print('Hello' + 'world') Method 3 link print('Hello' + 'world') Method 4 link print('Hello', 'world') Method 5 link print('{} {}'.format('Hello','world')) Method 6 link word1 = 'Hello' word2 = 'WorldÂ¡ print(f'{word1} {word2}) Method 7 link a = "!dlrow olleH" b = a[::-1] print(b) Method 8 link str = "!dlrow olleH" print(''.join(reversed(str))) Method 9 link def greeting(): print("Hello world!
